title: Man Cannot Live on Science Alone: The Meaning Crisis with Paul Vander Klay
description:
"We are in an iron box of secularism and we cannot see the stars." Our culture in the West has been looking for something to bring us meaning for a long time. I speak with pastor Paul Vander Klay about the context meaning crisis, and where he thinks the answer lies. We also go over Bret Weinstein's latest tweets on religion

Listen via podcast here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Man-Cannot-Live-on-Science-Alone-The-Meaning-Crisis-with-Paul-Vander-Klay-e98r4u

Paul's youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
Follow Paul on twitter @PaulVanderKlay, 
follow me @AndreaLynnLewis, email me andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
